member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Mobile.IReactiveGeolocator.Listen(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns an IObservable that continuously updates as the user's physical location changes. It is super important to make sure to dispose all subscriptions to this IObservable.
member.param: If set to true include heading.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Mobile.IReactiveGeolocator.GetPosition(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a single lookup of the user's current physical position
member.param: If set to true include heading.

member.name: T:ReactiveUI.Mobile.ReactiveGeolocator
member.summary: ReactiveGeolocator is an API to convert Xamarin Geolocation into something Rx-friendly.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Mobile.ReactiveGeolocator.Listen(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean)
